metadata.feature_description: Retrieve list of pages with filtering by parent ID and search key

steps.expected: Root-level pages should be displayed when no parent ID is specified
steps.actual: Root pages displayed correctly including Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, News, Community, and other top-level pages in the site hierarchy

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Get pages by parent ID (expand hierarchy)

steps.action: Expand a parent page (Activity Feed) in the page tree
steps.expected: Child pages should be displayed under the parent page
steps.actual: Child pages My Profile, Messages, and Friends displayed correctly under Activity Feed parent

steps.action: Enter 'Test' in the search field and submit
steps.expected: Pages matching the search key should be displayed
steps.actual: 35 pages containing 'Test' in the name were found and displayed in the search results

steps.action: View search results and verify pagination/count information
steps.expected: Total number of results should be displayed with pagination support
steps.actual: Results count displayed correctly showing '35 PAGES FOUND' for search results and '75 PAGES FOUND' for full list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - XSS prevention in page names

steps.action: View page with script tags in name: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
steps.expected: Script tags should be HTML-encoded and displayed as text, not executed
steps.actual: Page name displayed as HTML-encoded text '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' - XSS prevented

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - Search with special characters

steps.expected: Search should handle special characters and return matching pages
steps.actual: Search returned '1 PAGE FOUND' - correctly found 'Test@Page#123$' page

steps.expected: System should handle no results gracefully with appropriate message
steps.actual: Search displayed 'NO PAGE FOUND.' message - proper empty state handling

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - Long page names display

steps.action: View page with extremely long name (200+ characters)
steps.expected: Long page names should display without breaking the UI
steps.actual: Page 'ThisIsAnExtremelyLongPageNameThatExceedsNormalLengthLimitsAndShouldTriggerValidationErrorsIfThereAreAnyFieldLengthRestrictionsInPlaceForPageNamesInTheDNNEvoqSystemTestingFieldLengthValidation123456789' displayed correctly in list and details panel

observations: Permission-based filtering: Testing was performed as SuperUser (host account) which has full permissions. The API uses [AdvancedPermission(MenuName = 'Dnn.Pages', Permission = 'VIEW_PAGE_LIST,VIEW')] attribute to filter pages based on user permissions. Full permission testing would require creating users with different permission levels.
The GetPageList API accepts parentId=-1 by default which returns root pages, and searchKey parameter for filtering by name.
SearchPages API provides advanced filtering with pagination support (pageIndex, pageSize parameters) plus filters for pageType, tags, publishStatus, publishDateStart, publishDateEnd, and workflowId.
HTML encoding is properly implemented to prevent XSS attacks - script tags and special HTML characters are encoded for display.
Special characters in page names (@, #, $, &, <, >) are handled correctly in both display and search operations.
Very long page names (200+ characters) are accepted by the system and displayed without breaking the UI layout.
